name: Certificate of Graduate Study in Data Analytics

Certificate of Graduate Study in Data An: Certificate of Graduate Study in Data Analytics The Certificate of Graduate Study (COGS) in Data Analytics is designed for individuals who already have earned a Bachelorâ€™s degree and are looking to expand their knowledge and opportunities in the area of data analytics. There is an increased need for employees who can use programs, data, and computational tools to explore and discover relevant insights in big data as well as apply critical thinking skills to data analysis for purposes of improving organizational efficiency and solving business problems.

notes: Additional courses may be taken to fulfill the elective requirement with approval of the MBA Program Director or Graduate Academic Advisor Credits: 3

Total Required Credits for the Program: 9 s.h. Foundation Courses Please contact program coordinator for additional details. Graduation/Exit, Benchmark, and Thesis Requirements None Minimum Required Grades and Cumulative GPA The COGS in Data Analytics is a Category 3 program. For details regarding satisfactory academic progress and graduation requirements, please visit Academic Program Policy Categories.
